Title: Permits Agudath Israel Youth of Boro Park to file an application for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Permits Agudath Israel Youth of Boro Park to file an application for a real property tax exemption with respect to the tax years 2019-2020 through 2023-2024.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting Agudath Israel Youth of Boro Park to file an application for a real property tax exemption
